variable: stay at home duration in days

stochastic_function: lambda stay_at_home_decision: {5: 1.0} if stay_at_home_decision == 'stay at home' else {42: 1.0}

lambda stay_at_home_decision, income_in_usd, stay_at_home_duration_in_days: { - (income_in_usd * stay_at_home_duration_in_days) / 365 : 1.0 } if stay_at_home_decision == 'stay at home' else { 0: 1.0 }
variable: cost of staying at home in usd
evidence: stay at home duration in days

stochastic_function: lambda stay_at_home_duration_in_days, population_infection_density, number_of_people_one_contacts: {'exposed': 1 - (1 - population_infection_density)**(stay_at_home_duration_in_days * number_of_people_one_contacts), 'not exposed': (1 - population_infection_density)**(stay_at_home_duration_in_days * number_of_people_one_contacts)}
evidence: stay at home duration in days

stochastic_function: lambda infection: {0:1.0,14:0.0,31.5:0.0,35:0.0} if infection == 'not infected' else {0:0.0,14:1.0,31.5:0.0,35:0.0} if infection == 'mild' else {0:0.0,14:0.0,31.5:1.0,35:0.0} if infection in ['severe','critical'] else {0:0.0,14:0.0,31.5:0.0,35:1.0}
lambda infection, age, income_in_usd: { - (79 - age) * income_in_usd: 1.0 } if infection == 'dead' else { 0: 1.0 }
lambda hospital_stays_in_days, income_in_usd: {0:1.0} if hospital_stays_in_days == 0 else {1:1.0}
